```{r include=FALSE}
pkgs <- c(
  .packages(), 
  'bookdown', 
  'knitr', 
  'rmarkdown', 
  'kableExtra',
  'flextable',
  'huxtable',
  'gt',
  'gtsummary',
  'formattable',
  'DT',
  'reactable',
  'rhandsontable',
  'pixiedust',
  'stargazer',
  'xtable',
  'tables',
  'pander',
  'tangram',
  'ztable',
  'condformat')
# install packages if missing
lapply(pkgs, function(pkg) {
    if (system.file(package = pkg) != '') return()
    install.packages(pkg, repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org/") 
    }
)
# 自动生成 R 包的参考文献
knitr::write_bib(pkgs, 'packages.bib')
```
